title: I can't move as soon as I load in.
body: When I load into a game I can't move or do anything. I still have my normal desktop cursor when I load in. I've tried to repair the game, it didn't fix anything. Is there a fix or anything or can I just no longer play the game?

replies.body: If you're seeing the normal desktop cursor, that's a *really* good sign that some other program is shifting the focus of your windows. Usually, it's something like Discord Overlays or some other program, so I would start by turning off any programs that might have an overlay feature or just turning off the program entirely. Test it in a custom/practice game and let me know how it works without background programs interfering!
holy shit tahnk you it was discord
So after restarting my pc windows did a little update and it's working fine after
